A

An ActionType represents a robot action that may occupy a robot for multiple rounds.

returns the square of the minimum distance from this robot's location to a MapLocation in its attack range.

A Robot instance represents a robot in the game world.

Y

yield() - Method in interface battlecode.common.RobotController
Ends the current round and gives your robot a slight energon bonus, given by GameConstants.YIELD_BONUS * energonUpkeep * (fraction of unused bytecodes in the round).
YIELD_BONUS - Static variable in class battlecode.common.GameConstants
Percent of upkeep returned per unused bytecode for ending the round early
